alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock; Ohio (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 01 at 8:37PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 301 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL OHIO BELMONT GUERNSEY HARRISON JEFFERSON OH MUSKINGUM IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA ALLEGHENY WASHINGTON WESTMORELAND IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA ARMSTRONG INDIANA JEFFERSON PA IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA BROOKE HANCOCK OHIO THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BROOKVILLE, CADIZ, CAMBRIDGE, CANONSBURG, FOLLANSBEE, FORD CITY, GREENSBURG, INDIANA, KITTANNING, LATROBE, MARTINS FERRY, MURRYSVILLE, NEW KENSINGTON, PITTSBURGH METRO AREA, PUNXSUTAWNEY, ST. CLAIRSVILLE, STEUBENVILLE, WASHINGTON, WEIRTON, WELLSBURG, WHEELING, AND ZANESVILLE.
